text: The counties of Albania () are the first-level administrative territorial entities of the Republic of Albania. These 12 counties are subdivided into 61 municipalities, the second-level administrative territorial entities, which consist of 373 administrative units. The government structure is based on the 1998 constitution, while the reform was made effective on 31 July 2000. The twelve counties replaced the former districts (). == List of counties == {| class="sortable plainrowheaders wikitable" style="background:none; cellspacing=2px; text-align:left; font-size:90%;" |- style="font-size:100%; text-align:right;" !!
